com.hybris.cis.api.service

Interface CisService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AddressVerificationService, FraudService, GeolocationService, PaymentService, ShippingService, SubscriptionService, TaxService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccertifyFraudService, AddressVerificationServiceMockImpl, AvalaraAvs, AvalaraTaxService, CanadapostShipmentService, ConnectshipShipmentService, CybersourceAvs, CyberSourceFraudService, CyberSourcePaymentService, CyberSourceTaxService, FedexShipmentService, FraudServiceMockImpl, GeolocationServiceMockImpl, HybrisGeolocationService, KiaAvsServiceImpl, MonerisInteracPaymentService, MonerisPaymentService, MyFraudServiceImpl, MyGeolocationServiceImpl, MyShippingServiceImpl, MyTaxServiceImpl, PaymentServiceMockImpl, SampleAvsServiceImpl, SamplePaymentServiceImpl, ShippingServiceMockImpl, SubscriptionServiceMockImpl, TaxServiceMockImpl, UPSShippingService, UspsShipmentService, VertexTaxService, VindiciaSubscriptionService

    public interface CisService
    Marker interface for CIS services.
